race_form.race_comment: EVITANDO EL ABLANDE (3) returns after six months in the paddock. Closed the last campaign with a fifth over 1200m at this track. Looks the one to beat. QIP SINGING (11) is yet to break through in five runs. Finished fourth at his last appearance over 1400m at this track on April 4. This looks a nice race so expect him to be right in the finish. KNOCK NOW (8) made progress last time out, finishing 3 lengths from the winner in third at the end of 1400m at Palermo Turf. Will enjoy a drop in class so he is ready to find the winners' list. CECIL SMITH (9) is facing the starter for the first time. By Equal Stripes and comes from the Carlos Daniel Etchechoury stable. Pay to watch for any positive betting moves.
race_form.race_comment_alternative: EVITANDO EL ABLANDE (3) returns after six months in the paddock. Closed the last campaign with a fifth over 1200m at this track. Looks the one to beat. QIP SINGING (11) is yet to break through in five runs. Finished fourth at his last appearance over 1400m at this track on April 4. This looks a nice race so expect him to be right in the finish. KNOCK NOW (8) made progress last time out, finishing 3 lengths from the winner in third at the end of 1400m at Palermo Turf. Will enjoy a drop in class so he is ready to find the winners' list. CECIL SMITH (9) is facing the starter for the first time. By Equal Stripes and comes from the Carlos Daniel Etchechoury stable. Pay to watch for any positive betting moves.

race_form.race_comment: CLEVER LADY (1) Looked good when 3rd last start here and drawn beautifully. J Barria is a crucial engagement. Has run into the placings at every start this campaign. This suits. LA CONSENTIDA (3) Ran 7th last run at the track. Should bounce back. Should be very competitive and is a genuine threat. SILVER SHINE (4) Placed 2nd last start at this track. Can go on with it. AMALFI V. (7) Below par when 11th last start here. Recent form of J Pedroza is strong. Solid place bet prospects.
race_form.race_comment_alternative: CLEVER LADY (1) Looked good when 3rd last start here and drawn beautifully. J Barria is a crucial engagement. Has run into the placings at every start this campaign. This suits. LA CONSENTIDA (3) Ran 7th last run at the track. Should bounce back. Should be very competitive and is a genuine threat. SILVER SHINE (4) Placed 2nd last start at this track. Can go on with it. AMALFI V. (7) Below par when 11th last start here. Recent form of J Pedroza is strong. Solid place bet prospects.

race_form.race_comment: MILAGROSA (10) faced the starter for the first time and finished eighth last start at this track over 1000m, beaten 20 lengths. Expected to be very competitive. ALBANELLA (1) is a two-year-old filly by The Leopard out of Alfarera on debut for the Jose I Cuitino stable. Should get all the favours out of an inside gate. Serious contender, particularly if solid in the market. MADAME ALGO (4) is a two-year-old filly on debut from the stable of Fernando Gabriel Espina. By Algorithms from Madame Quick. Any push in betting should be respected. OUR DREAM (2) is a two-year-old filly on debut from the stable of Nelson David Fernandez. By Giant Hope from My Dream. Watch the market closely.
race_form.race_comment_alternative: MILAGROSA (10) faced the starter for the first time and finished eighth last start at this track over 1000m, beaten 20 lengths. Expected to be very competitive. ALBANELLA (1) is a two-year-old filly by The Leopard out of Alfarera on debut for the Jose I Cuitino stable. Should get all the favours out of an inside gate. Serious contender, particularly if solid in the market. MADAME ALGO (4) is a two-year-old filly on debut from the stable of Fernando Gabriel Espina. By Algorithms from Madame Quick. Any push in betting should be respected. OUR DREAM (2) is a two-year-old filly on debut from the stable of Nelson David Fernandez. By Giant Hope from My Dream. Watch the market closely.

race_form.race_comment: ETERNAL DELIGHT (7) resumes after finishing eighth at her latest appearance at Kawartha Downs on July 19. Talented and has plenty of upside. Has to contend with a very wide draw. Finds a suitable assignment and will be a major force. MCJAZZ (1) is racing well with four top-five finishes in succession, the latest effort a second at this track over 1609m. Sure to enjoy an economical run from this draw. Recent efforts are good enough to put her right in the finish. KIT KAK (5) is heading the right way, improving last time out to finish second at Western Fair Raceway over 1609m. Genuine threat. NEWSWRITER (4) is in the mix following a fifth at her first run back over 1609m at this track.
race_form.race_comment_alternative: ETERNAL DELIGHT (7) resumes after finishing eighth at her latest appearance at Kawartha Downs on July 19. Talented and has plenty of upside. Has to contend with a very wide draw. Finds a suitable assignment and will be a major force. MCJAZZ (1) is racing well with four top-five finishes in succession, the latest effort a second at this track over 1609m. Sure to enjoy an economical run from this draw. Recent efforts are good enough to put her right in the finish. KIT KAK (5) is heading the right way, improving last time out to finish second at Western Fair Raceway over 1609m. Genuine threat. NEWSWRITER (4) is in the mix following a fifth at her first run back over 1609m at this track.

race_form.race_comment: JUST A SIP (7) Weakened under pressure when 5th last start at Sam Houston. Should improve and promising career start. Will be pushing for a forward position early. Back to more ground. Has the ability to take this out. CHANNEL LAUNCH (2) Won by a big margin of more than 7L last start at Sunland Park and has a positive draw. Alfredo J Juarez Jr is a bonus. Worth a ticket. HAKUHIA (6) Controlled the pace to win by 5 1/2L last run at Santa Anita and racing over more ground. First appearance for a new trainer. Winnable race. SECURED (9) Was making up some late ground when 5th last run at Sam Houston. Has the ability to figure.
race_form.race_comment_alternative: JUST A SIP (7) Weakened under pressure when 5th last start at Sam Houston. Should improve and promising career start. Will be pushing for a forward position early. Back to more ground. Has the ability to take this out. CHANNEL LAUNCH (2) Won by a big margin of more than 7L last start at Sunland Park and has a positive draw. Alfredo J Juarez Jr is a bonus. Worth a ticket. HAKUHIA (6) Controlled the pace to win by 5 1/2L last run at Santa Anita and racing over more ground. First appearance for a new trainer. Winnable race. SECURED (9) Was making up some late ground when 5th last run at Sam Houston. Has the ability to figure.

race_form.race_comment: SEE THE BOLD (5) Sub-standard effort when 7th last run around here. Can show a better performance this time. Expect to go close. WALK THRU CARTEL (2) Ordinary performance when 7th last start at the track but fitter for debut run. Can find a nice position from the draw. Could be value. DK DONCELLA (3) Unsatisfactory performance when 6th last run at this venue but fitter for debut run. Worth entertaining from a place and tricast perspective. CC REGAL DANCE (4) Performed below standard when 7th last time at this venue but having second race start. Tricast and place contender.
race_form.race_comment_alternative: SEE THE BOLD (5) Sub-standard effort when 7th last run around here. Can show a better performance this time. Expect to go close. WALK THRU CARTEL (2) Ordinary performance when 7th last start at the track but fitter for debut run. Can find a nice position from the draw. Could be value. DK DONCELLA (3) Unsatisfactory performance when 6th last run at this venue but fitter for debut run. Worth entertaining from a place and tricast perspective. CC REGAL DANCE (4) Performed below standard when 7th last time at this venue but having second race start. Tricast and place contender.

race_form.race_comment: SILVER BEAST (5) has recorded two wins and two minor placings from the past five starts. Didn't let supporters down at his latest appearance when he got the job done by 4 metres over 1609m at Western Fair Raceway. Meets some better types this time but another win is on the cards. ASHLEYSBEST (4) finished second at Western Fair Raceway two runs ago before finishing sixth at his latest appearance over 1609m at this track, beaten 7 metres. Stepping up a level this time but on his best form he is good enough to take this out. ARTISTIC PICK (1) is close to a win after two successive placings, the latest a third over 1609m at this track. Great chance to break through. DREAMY FELLA (2) cannot be left out after solid recent performances, the latest a sound fifth at this track over 1609m.
race_form.race_comment_alternative: SILVER BEAST (5) has recorded two wins and two minor placings from the past five starts. Didn't let supporters down at his latest appearance when he got the job done by 4 metres over 1609m at Western Fair Raceway. Meets some better types this time but another win is on the cards. ASHLEYSBEST (4) finished second at Western Fair Raceway two runs ago before finishing sixth at his latest appearance over 1609m at this track, beaten 7 metres. Stepping up a level this time but on his best form he is good enough to take this out. ARTISTIC PICK (1) is close to a win after two successive placings, the latest a third over 1609m at this track. Great chance to break through. DREAMY FELLA (2) cannot be left out after solid recent performances, the latest a sound fifth at this track over 1609m.

race_form.race_comment: GO GO BOSS (5) Romped home to win last run at Sam Houston and promising career start. Displays very good finishing speed. Very competitive this preparation and demonstrating upward trajectory in recent races. Can take this out. KNOCK KNOCK JOKE (3) Won by a big margin of close to 9L last run here. Shows very good closing speed. Alfredo J Juarez Jr is a key engagement. Don't leave out of trifectas. DANCIN FOR GOLD (4) Controlled the pace to win by just short of 13L last time at this track. Has scope so do not ignore. SMARTIER (7) Weakened to finish 5th last time at Sunland Park. Shows good early pace. Recent form of the stable is strong. Could run into the money.
race_form.race_comment_alternative: GO GO BOSS (5) Romped home to win last run at Sam Houston and promising career start. Displays very good finishing speed. Very competitive this preparation and demonstrating upward trajectory in recent races. Can take this out. KNOCK KNOCK JOKE (3) Won by a big margin of close to 9L last run here. Shows very good closing speed. Alfredo J Juarez Jr is a key engagement. Don't leave out of trifectas. DANCIN FOR GOLD (4) Controlled the pace to win by just short of 13L last time at this track. Has scope so do not ignore. SMARTIER (7) Weakened to finish 5th last time at Sunland Park. Shows good early pace. Recent form of the stable is strong. Could run into the money.

race_form.race_comment: DOUBLE THUNDER (1) Finished with purpose when winning last run here and strong form at the trip. Should be going forward early. Can save some energy from the barrier. Looks promising in this race. MCMONEY (2) Rocketed home when winning last time at the track and gets a favourable alley. First start for a new trainer. Deserves consideration. CHAOS REIGNS (5) Honest run on the speed before fading to finish 2nd beaten by 1L last time at the track. Should jump out and bowl along. Goes very close. EUCLID AVENUE (8) Dictated the tempo when winning by a margin of 1 3/4L last start at Oaklawn Park. Contender in this event.
race_form.race_comment_alternative: DOUBLE THUNDER (1) Finished with purpose when winning last run here and strong form at the trip. Should be going forward early. Can save some energy from the barrier. Looks promising in this race. MCMONEY (2) Rocketed home when winning last time at the track and gets a favourable alley. First start for a new trainer. Deserves consideration. CHAOS REIGNS (5) Honest run on the speed before fading to finish 2nd beaten by 1L last time at the track. Should jump out and bowl along. Goes very close. EUCLID AVENUE (8) Dictated the tempo when winning by a margin of 1 3/4L last start at Oaklawn Park. Contender in this event.

race_form.race_comment: LETMEIN (7) Dominant winner by a margin of 12L last time here and showing consistent performance in races. Should jump out and bowl along. Can win this. WESTERN FREEDOM (1) Shot away to win by 3 1/2L last time around here and drawn the rails. Can go through the gears. Must respect in this event. CHECK'S ON THE WAY (4) Folded up in the straight when 9th last time at the track. Happy to overlook that run but coming back in distance. Will be around the mark at odds. HEZASPANISHDANCER (2) Gave them all something to chase when winning by a margin of 6L last run at Los Alamitos and promising career start. Has a positive gate. Has to be included.
race_form.race_comment_alternative: LETMEIN (7) Dominant winner by a margin of 12L last time here and showing consistent performance in races. Should jump out and bowl along. Can win this. WESTERN FREEDOM (1) Shot away to win by 3 1/2L last time around here and drawn the rails. Can go through the gears. Must respect in this event. CHECK'S ON THE WAY (4) Folded up in the straight when 9th last time at the track. Happy to overlook that run but coming back in distance. Will be around the mark at odds. HEZASPANISHDANCER (2) Gave them all something to chase when winning by a margin of 6L last run at Los Alamitos and promising career start. Has a positive gate. Has to be included.

race_form.race_comment: EARENDEL (9) wasn't far off maiden success before a break of five months, finishing the campaign with a minor placing over 1308m at this track. Set to return in style. BEACH CRICKET (10) is a talented filly who tackled a tougher race at her last run on November 30 and finished tenth behind Aristella over 1710m at Listed level at this track. Has the addition of blinkers; should go well. VINTAGE RING (3) didn't do a lot on debut three-and-a-half weeks ago, finishing 7 lengths from the winner in fifth over 1408m at Keeneland (Dirt). Draws far better this time. Open to plenty of improvement. One of the main contenders. MY EMMY (6) has not appeared since she finished tenth over 1609m at Gulfstream Park on December 8. Sure to measure up.
race_form.race_comment_alternative: EARENDEL (9) wasn't far off maiden success before a break of five months, finishing the campaign with a minor placing over 1308m at this track. Set to return in style. BEACH CRICKET (10) is a talented filly who tackled a tougher race at her last run on November 30 and finished tenth behind Aristella over 1710m at Listed level at this track. Has the addition of blinkers; should go well. VINTAGE RING (3) didn't do a lot on debut three-and-a-half weeks ago, finishing 7 lengths from the winner in fifth over 1408m at Keeneland (Dirt). Draws far better this time. Open to plenty of improvement. One of the main contenders. MY EMMY (6) has not appeared since she finished tenth over 1609m at Gulfstream Park on December 8. Sure to measure up.

race_form.race_comment: DONA PAELLA (2) produced a nice effort on debut in better company last start over 1600m at this track when second, beaten 2 lengths. Promising type with improvement to come so she should pay to follow. ECONOMICA SONG (4) is a three-year-old filly by Alcindor out of Colla Di Grita set to debut for the Elvio Ramon Bortule stable. Looks set for a bright start. Watch for positive market leads. NORITA LOVE (5) missed the frame on debut then progressed nicely at her second outing, finishing 6 lengths from the winner in second at the end of 1600m at this track. Taking on a better field but she is good enough to take this out. CARTA CANCION (3) debuted five-and-a-half weeks ago when she finished fourth over 1500m at La Plata, beaten 2 lengths. Better for that run and can improve sharply.
race_form.race_comment_alternative: DONA PAELLA (2) produced a nice effort on debut in better company last start over 1600m at this track when second, beaten 2 lengths. Promising type with improvement to come so she should pay to follow. ECONOMICA SONG (4) is a three-year-old filly by Alcindor out of Colla Di Grita set to debut for the Elvio Ramon Bortule stable. Looks set for a bright start. Watch for positive market leads. Better for that run and can improve sharply.

race_form.race_comment: MY FANCY HEART (4) Just missed last start around here. Has shown early pace in races to date. Tracking very well this campaign. Must respect. FAST BREAK FAMOUS (2) Threw down a serious challenge last run at this track and solid career start. Likely to be well placed early. Drawn nicely. Has to be included. FOLLY BLOOD (9) Solid effort when placing 3rd last start at Louisiana Downs. Should be rolling forward early from the wide stall. Definite claims. RELENTLESS DEAL (6) Finished 3rd last start around here. Has good tactical speed and will be nicely positioned. Chance in this field so include in exotics.

FOLLY BLOOD (9) Solid effort when placing 3rd last start at Louisiana Downs. Should be rolling forward early from the wide stall. Definite claims. RELENTLESS DEAL (6) Finished 3rd last start around here. Has good tactical speed and will be nicely positioned. Chance in this field so include in exotics.

race_form.race_comment: PARLAY KING (2) finished third last start over 1609m at Mohawk Park, beaten 5 metres, after also filling a minor placing at the previous appearance over 1609m at this track. Sure to enjoy an economical run from this draw. Ideally placed and is sure to prove tough to beat. WICKED MOVE (1) finished fourth last start, beaten 5 metres at this track over 1609m. Expect him to pose a serious challenge. ROYEL SPORT (3) is on the radar after his last-start fourth over 1609m at this track a week-and-a-half ago. MANKOTA (7) is in the mix if he can recapture the form from two starts back that saw him finish third over 1609m at this track.
race_form.race_comment_alternative: PARLAY KING (2) finished third last start over 1609m at Mohawk Park, beaten 5 metres, after also filling a minor placing at the previous appearance over 1609m at this track. Sure to enjoy an economical run from this draw. Ideally placed and is sure to prove tough to beat. WICKED MOVE (1) finished fourth last start, beaten 5 metres at this track over 1609m. Expect him to pose a serious challenge. ROYEL SPORT (3) is on the radar after his last-start fourth over 1609m at this track a week-and-a-half ago. MANKOTA (7) is in the mix if he can recapture the form from two starts back that saw him finish third over 1609m at this track.

race_form.race_comment: COCKTAIL (8) turned in a plain effort last time when seventh at this track over 390m behind Minh Georgy (23.05) in a Grade 5. Can atone. INFRARED RAYS (7) boxed on well to finish third last time, beaten 1.75 lengths (22.34) behind Mac And Cheese at this track. Can feature again. SOMETHING CLEVER (3) showed little early speed at his last couple, the latest finishing sixth (23.75) in a Grade 5 at Horsham. Form at the trip sound including five wins. Expected to run well. COCONUT OAKLAND (1) is worth another chance despite missing the top-three here most recently.
race_form.race_comment_alternative: COCKTAIL (8) turned in a plain effort last time when seventh at this track over 390m behind Minh Georgy (23.05) in a Grade 5. Can atone. INFRARED RAYS (7) boxed on well to finish third last time, beaten 1.75 lengths (22.34) behind Mac And Cheese at this track. Can feature again. SOMETHING CLEVER (3) showed little early speed at his last couple, the latest finishing sixth (23.75) in a Grade 5 at Horsham. Form at the trip sound including five wins. Expected to run well. COCONUT OAKLAND (1) is worth another chance despite missing the top-three here most recently.

race_form.race_comment: I ' M OUTSTANDING (6) Put the head down when winning last run here and racing over extra ground. Recent form of Peter John I Parsard is strong. Worth strong consideration. BOSS MAN (7) Snagged a narrow win last start at this track. Good to see jockey Oneil Mullings is jumping on. Has not missed the money this campaign in 2 attempts. Worth consideration. RUNAWAY STAR (2) Placed 2nd last run around here and good career start. Been in the placegetters each start this preparation and has a good draw. Raddeish Roman is a bonus. Must be considered. MARK MY IDENTITY (11) Finished 3rd last start here and solid career start. Enos L Brown stable are on a hot streak but carrying more weight than last time. Capable of a running a place.
race_form.race_comment_alternative: I ' M OUTSTANDING (6) Put the head down when winning last run here and racing over extra ground. Recent form of Peter John I Parsard is strong. Worth strong consideration. BOSS MAN (7) Snagged a narrow win last start at this track. Good to see jockey Oneil Mullings is jumping on. Has not missed the money this campaign in 2 attempts. Worth consideration. RUNAWAY STAR (2) Placed 2nd last run around here and good career start. Been in the placegetters each start this preparation and has a good draw. Raddeish Roman is a bonus. Must be considered. MARK MY IDENTITY (11) Finished 3rd last start here and solid career start. Enos L Brown stable are on a hot streak but carrying more weight than last time. Capable of a running a place.

race_form.race_comment: FREED FROM DESIRE (2) resumes from a spell of six-and-a-half months after closing off last campaign in good form, the last run being a solid third over 1609m at this track. Will enjoy a nice run from this favourable starting position. Sure to prove hard to beat on her return. RELEASE THE WICKED (3) has been competitive of late and kept the ball rolling last time when 0.8 metres from the winner in second over 1609m at this track. A nice draw on the front line should ensure a cosy run. Good enough to put herself in the winners' stall. SHOWERWITHECAPTAIN (1) is a likely improver after debuting with a solid third last time out over 1609m at Western Fair Raceway. BRITTAS BEST BET (9) ended last prep with a sixth at Mohawk Park over 1609m nine months ago. Capable of a forward showing while fresh.

A nice draw on the front line should ensure a cosy run. Good enough to put herself in the winners' stall. BRITTAS BEST BET (9) ended last prep with a sixth at Mohawk Park over 1609m nine months ago. Capable of a forward showing while fresh.

race_form.race_comment: CARIBBEAN KING (6) Gave away some ground when 7th last time at Turf Paradise and coming back in trip. Antonio Fresu is a key engagement. Goes close. OSAGE CREEK (2) Led all the way when winning by a margin of 3L last time at this venue and can find a nice position from the draw. Unbeaten last 2 attempts. Must respect. YOGI BOY (3) Ran over the top of them when winning last run at the track and showing improvement in recent outings. Amongst the placegetters at every start this campaign. Up to these. REXFORD (10) Resumes from a spell. Claimed late when 3rd beaten by 2 1/4L last start at this track. Can threaten if right today.
race_form.race_comment_alternative: CARIBBEAN KING (6) Gave away some ground when 7th last time at Turf Paradise and coming back in trip. Antonio Fresu is a key engagement. Goes close. REXFORD (10) Resumes from a spell. Claimed late when 3rd beaten by 2 1/4L last start at this track. Can threaten if right today.

race_form.race_comment: BURNING HEDGE (3) Ran 4th last time at this venue and will have to carry more weight. Amongst the placegetters on multiple occasions this campaign. Good prospects. PERFECT AFFAIR (6) Was fighting out the finish when winning last run here. Anthony C Nunes has been training plenty of winners recently. Genuine winning chance. LINGUIST (10) On a short turnaround. Game effort to win narrowly last time at this venue. Jockey Dick Cardenas and trainer Anthony C Nunes are a proven combination. No shock to see a win. SOCIAL AVIATOR (2) Ran 2nd last run here and has a good draw. Jockey Robert Halledeen and trainer Jason A Dacosta show promise as a duo. Showing consistent performance in races. Worth consideration.
race_form.race_comment_alternative: BURNING HEDGE (3) Ran 4th last time at this venue and will have to carry more weight. Amongst the placegetters on multiple occasions this campaign. Good prospects. PERFECT AFFAIR (6) Was fighting out the finish when winning last run here. Anthony C Nunes has been training plenty of winners recently. Genuine winning chance. LINGUIST (10) On a short turnaround. Game effort to win narrowly last time at this venue. Jockey Dick Cardenas and trainer Anthony C Nunes are a proven combination. No shock to see a win. SOCIAL AVIATOR (2) Ran 2nd last run here and has a good draw. Jockey Robert Halledeen and trainer Jason A Dacosta show promise as a duo. Showing consistent performance in races. Worth consideration.

SCOTT SIGMA (4) was impressive last time, posting an effortless 4 lengths win in taking a Mix 6/7 in 22.18 and a new Best time this course and distance. Can measure up again if runs up to latest. STARTING OUT (8) jumped cleanly from the rails last start to lead all the way and score (22.19) at this track in a Grade 7 over 390m. Some good form is emerging from his last run. Form should stack up. DEADLY FORCE (2) found trouble in the run here last time and fell. No luck latest and gets chance to atone. BLACK CABANG (1) can feature with the right run.

race_form.race_comment: DOBLE CAT (8) has not raced since his debut back on February 21 when he finished seventh over 1100m at this track. Likely improver and can get off the mark this time. BLACK DOG (14) stepped out on his debut over 1000m at Florida seven-and-a-half weeks ago and finished seventh, beaten 24 lengths. Big chance with race experience now on board. REY MISTERIO (12) turned in a moderate debut over 1400m at this track on April 12 when he was safely held in fifth, 25 lengths from the winner. Plenty of scope for improvement. One of the main contenders. TACO MEN (5) is a two-year-old colt on debut from the stable of Jorge J Rey. By Midshipman from Genebra. Worth watching for a betting push.

Big chance with race experience now on board. REY MISTERIO (12) turned in a moderate debut over 1400m at this track on April 12 when he was safely held in fifth, 25 lengths from the winner. Plenty of scope for improvement. One of the main contenders. TACO MEN (5) is a two-year-old colt on debut from the stable of Jorge J Rey. By Midshipman from Genebra. Worth watching for a betting push.

race_form.race_comment: BETH (1) ran seventh last start at Mohawk Park over 1609m, beaten 4 metres. Likely to get all the favours from this nice draw. This doesn't look as hard so she is sure to prove tough to beat. NASTY REPUTATION (3) finished fourth last start, beaten 6 metres at this track over 1609m. Capable of playing a major role so has to be respected. HILLBILLY JET (8) is in the mix following a fifth at her most recent appearance over 1609m at this track. WINTER GRAM (5) disappointed last time when eighth over 1609m at Western Fair Raceway. Can bounce back.

WINTER GRAM (5) disappointed last time when eighth over 1609m at Western Fair Raceway. Can bounce back.

race_form.race_comment: GALLARDO (7) finished fourth when resuming last start at Melo over 1500m. Has since changed yards and significantly he won second-up when last in work. Well-placed and sure to feature. SUPER FAST (6) is a eight-start maiden who resumed from a spell last start and was beaten 6 lengths when fourth over 1100m at this track. Can come on from that run and looks a serious contender. VITETE (13) was out of the money two runs back then again missed the frame last start over 1200m at this track, beaten 16 lengths into eighth. Suitably placed so anticipating a big run this time. A LO MESTRE (3) lines up for the first time since February 16. Started the last campaign in good style when in the placings over 1500m at this track. Among the better hopes.

Suitably placed so anticipating a big run this time. A LO MESTRE (3) lines up for the first time since February 16. Started the last campaign in good style when in the placings over 1500m at this track. Among the better hopes.

race_form.race_comment: THE LIES WE TELL (5) drew wide last start and was never a genuine threat, beaten 6 metres into seventh at Mohawk Park over 1609m. From this far better draw can return to something like her best. CHILLINONTHEBEACH (2) has had two runs this prep and is yet to finish in the top three. Added to the sequence last time over 1609m at Mohawk Park, finishing 14 metres away from the winner in ninth. Will enjoy a nice run from this favourable starting position. This is a nice drop in grade so she is sure to prove tough to beat. TJ BLISS (8) comes right into contention after scoring last start by 0.8 metres at this track over 1609m. AUTUMN HONEY (9) is tough to leave out on the back of two successive wins, most recently at this track a week ago.

This is a nice drop in grade so she is sure to prove tough to beat. TJ BLISS (8) comes right into contention after scoring last start by 0.8 metres at this track over 1609m. AUTUMN HONEY (9) is tough to leave out on the back of two successive wins, most recently at this track a week ago.

race_form.race_comment: AK BLACK BADGER (1) comes here just three days after finishing third beaten 1.75 metres over 1609m at Mohawk Park. Likely to get all the favours from this nice draw. Has the talent to make her presence felt again. MY MASERATI (9) is in good form at present. Finished third at her latest appearance over 1609m at this track, beaten 3 metres. Will need a bit of luck negotiating a very wide starting position. It doesn't get any easier but on her best form she is good enough to take this out. PRETTY MISSY MAY (2) is looming as a real threat after a better effort last start, finishing third at this track over 1609m. DOLLYDAYDREAM (7) disappointed last time but is a chance based on a good third over 1609m at Mohawk Park two runs back.

DOLLYDAYDREAM (7) disappointed last time but is a chance based on a good third over 1609m at Mohawk Park two runs back.

race_form.race_comment: PHILIPSBURG (6) Ran on when 2nd last run at this venue. Orlando Mojica and Armando Hernandez are usually a competitive duo. Warrants a bet. LAST MINUTE (3) Resumes after a break of 42 weeks. Gave them all something to chase to win by more than 9L last time around here. Gets a chance to win. ALL ABOUT TONITE (2) Maintained a solid pace but eventually weakened to finish 3rd beaten by more than 5L last start around here and will try to take advantage of the draw. Expect to go close. TAKEITAWAY (1) Struggled with the pace when 4th last start around here. Overlooking the last run and good career start. Has good tactical speed and will be nicely positioned. Will be there at the finish.

TAKEITAWAY (1) Struggled with the pace when 4th last start around here. Overlooking the last run and good career start. Has good tactical speed and will be nicely positioned. Will be there at the finish.

race_form.race_comment: PRINCIPE ALFREDO (4) Nice run when 3rd last time here but back in trip. Amongst the placegetters at every start this preparation. Strong hope. DIVAS FIRST DIVA (3) Clearly outclassed when 8th last start around here. Has the ability to turn things around but will be dropping in distance. Well placed and has solid claims. RG BEAUTIFUL SANDY (6) Fresh after a break. Snagged a narrow win last start at this track and back over extra ground. Demonstrating upward trajectory in recent races. Should be competitive in this race at a bit of odds. SE LOGANS DASH (5) Mediocre display when 5th last start around here. Keep in mind.

Should be competitive in this race at a bit of odds. SE LOGANS DASH (5) Mediocre display when 5th last start around here. Keep in mind.

race_form.race_comment: ASTON ARDBEG (4) was drawn the middle but pinged the lids and led until the final stages, holding on for a place (22.43) at this track in a Maiden over 390m. The form out of the last run is proven to be strong. Likely to feature again. BRODIE'S SHADOW (3) made an eye-catching debut when flew the lids with a fast early split and led until late but gathered in when a 2 length second at this track over 390m in 22.31. Can measure up if runs up to debut effort. MINOR THING (7) flew the lids last start and led throughout to register her maiden win by 1.3 lengths at this track over 390m (22.48). Boxed wide here. Yet to win here but has run some good races. Should be in this for a long way. SUNNY STRIDE (1) is a Jordan Formosa-trained newcomer by Aston Rupee out of Cindy Maree. Gets every chance from the inside draw. Market to provide the best guide to his chances.

race_form.race_comment: IDEAL BEACHWHERE (2) finished fifth last start, beaten 3 metres at Mohawk Park over 1609m. Talented and has plenty of upside. Has the benefit of a good draw. Finds a suitable assignment and will be a major force. LUCKY DANCER (6) turned in a much better run last time out, finishing second over 1609m at this track. Tackles a similar assignment and he can go right on with the job. THEYMAKEUSBETTER (3) is in the mix following a respectable third at his most recent appearance over 1609m at this track. GERONIMO CREEK (7) is worth some thought after his last-start fourth over 1609m at this track on April 27.

GERONIMO CREEK (7) is worth some thought after his last-start fourth over 1609m at this track on April 27.

race_form.race_comment: OCEANS 13 (4) Narrowly denied victory last run at the track. Likely to be well placed early. Should go close. THE WIZARD AND I (6) Disappointing effort when 9th last time at this venue. Displays good closing speed. Winnable race. NO DOUT ABOUT IT (7) Placed 2nd last run at this venue. Expect to go close. RTA IVORY PROSPECT (1) Rocking Ta Ivolene 4yo on debut for Theodore Alexander and drawn well. Watch early betting.

RTA IVORY PROSPECT (1) Rocking Ta Ivolene 4yo on debut for Theodore Alexander and drawn well. Watch early betting.

race_form.race_comment: SCOTT GNARLY (6) comes off an average effort last start when fifth at Bendigo over 425m behind Paw Xabia (24.40) in a R/A FIN. Scored at her previous run. Form from her last run is proving strong. Looks the one to beat on her best form. PAW REX (3) boasts a strong record this journey with six wins and two minors from 13 tries. Comes off a (23.80) win last time, scoring by 8 lengths in a Mix 3/4 over 425m at Bendigo. Looks a key chance on best figures. ZESTY BOY (8) turned spotting a big start finishing fifth (24.85) last time in a Grade 5 at Bendigo. Has a good record here at this journey. Should be about the money. MILLIE (2) can play a role coming off a short let-up.
race_form.race_comment_alternative: SCOTT GNARLY (6) comes off an average effort last start when fifth at Bendigo over 425m behind Paw Xabia (24.40) in a R/A FIN. Scored at her previous run. Form from her last run is proving strong. Looks the one to beat on her best form. PAW REX (3) boasts a strong record this journey with six wins and two minors from 13 tries. ZESTY BOY (8) turned spotting a big start finishing fifth (24.85) last time in a Grade 5 at Bendigo. Has a good record here at this journey. Should be about the money. MILLIE (2) can play a role coming off a short let-up.

race_form.race_comment: PINAROO FLYER (2) trailed the lead and fought on well to be beaten a head into second (23.64) at Horsham in a Maiden over 410m. Top chance in this line up. KUNAMA NAMADGI (1) is a first starter from the Kate Jackson kennel by Zambora Brockie out of Let It Rain. Drawn favourably and can capitalise. Strong market watch advised but profiles nicely for this. WE GOT LUCKY (4) last start finished 4th over 390m at this track beaten 7 lengths (22.92) behind Market Jet in a Maiden on April 7. With even luck and a clean start should be around the money. WOW GIRL (3) is not to be discarded.

race_form.race_comment: SILVER MAJESTY (1) resumes from a spell of seven months after showing some very good form last campaign, closing it off with a win over 1609m at Hippodrome 3R. Sure to enjoy an economical run from this draw. Likely to run a big race to kick off this campaign. MAPLE SHADOW (6) is racing well with six top-five finishes in succession, the latest effort a third at this track over 1609m. Leading hope in a similar assignment. ACEFORTYFOUR REBEL (7) was responsible for a better effort last time out when runner-up over 1609m at this track. Should run a big race. TWIN B BODACIOUS (3) is worth plenty of thought off a last-start win by half a metre at Western Fair Raceway over 1609m.

TWIN B BODACIOUS (3) is worth plenty of thought off a last-start win by half a metre at Western Fair Raceway over 1609m.

race_form.race_comment: ASHER (5) Came in 3rd last run around here. Has good tactical speed and will be nicely positioned. Been in the placegetters each start this campaign. Suitably placed in this race. LIGHTS N LIPS (9) Matt Whitekiller trained 2yo by The Marfa Lights having first race start. Watch the betting. BABYGOTGOODATGOODBYE (4) 2yo by Eagles Fly Higher having initial appearance for Edward Ross Hardy. Keep your eye on the market. IZA GOOD GIRL (10) First start at the races 2yo by Kvn Corona for John D Hammes. Watch the market.
